Freq: 7543
繐，细而稀疏的麻布。古时多用作丧服 [fine textured cloth]
Ying, a thin and sparse linen cloth. In ancient times, it was mostly used as mourning clothes [fine textured cloth]

繐字的基本解释

繐
suì
同“穗”②。

繐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suì］
［《廣韻》相鋭切，去祭，心。］
［《廣韻》胡桂切，去霽，匣。］
(1)细而稀疏的麻布。古代多用作丧服。
(2)用同“穗”。用丝、线或其他条缕结扎成穗状下垂的装饰物。

繐字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　繐； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页938第19
【廣韻】【集韻。】?胡桂切，音慧。【說文】細疏布也。【儀禮·士冠禮】不屨繐屨。【註】縷不灰治曰繐。又【喪服】繐衰者何，以小功之繐也。【註】凡布細而疏者，謂之繐。【禮·檀弓】綌縗繐裳，非古也。【註】非時尚輕凉慢禮。【釋名】齊人謂凉爲惠，言服之輕細凉惠也。【玉篇】同?。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?相銳切，音歲。義同。　又【集韻】旋芮切，音彗。義同。

繐字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
繐字的起名意思

用纸条、布条或丝线等扎成的装饰品。

繐
Basic explanation of words
繐
suì
Same as "Sui"②.
繐
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suì］
["Guangyun" cut each other, go to sacrifice, heart. ]
["Guangyun" Hu Guiqie, go to Ji, Xie. ]
(1) Thin and sparse linen. In ancient times, it was mostly used as a mourning dress.
(2) Use the same as "sui". Tie with silk, thread or other strands to form a spike-like drooping decoration.
繐

[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun. ]? Hu Guiqie, Yinhui. [Said the text] The cloth is also thin. 【Rituals·Shiguan Ceremony】No 屦繐繐屦. [Note] The wisps are not gray and the treatment is said to be 繐. And [mourning clothes] What are the declining ones, with little merit. [Note] Where the cloth is thin and sparse, it is called Zhijing. 【Ritual·Tan Gong】The clothes of 綌缞繐 are not ancient. [Note] Non-fashionable light, cool and slow gift. [Release name] Qi people say that coolness is benefit, and the lightness of words is also cool and benefit.
